sentences.sContent: The captain and crew welcome you aboard.
sentences.sCn: 机长和全体机组人员欢迎各位乘坐本次航班。

sentences.sContent: He captained the winning team in 1991.

synos.tran: 队长，首领；[水运]船长；上尉；海军上校

phrases.pCn: 库克船长（英国探险家和航海家）

words.tran: 首领或队长之职；统帅之才；将帅的资格

trans.tranOther: the sailor in charge of a ship, or the pilot in charge of an aircraft
If you captain a team or a ship, you are the captain of it
